data.author: lesliesbird

changelog.release_notes:
3.4 - Added support for Pebble 2 Diorite and Pebble Time 2 Emery.
New improved images of Bob!
Changed out one of the subliminal images.
3.3 - Added support for Pebble Time Round, adjusted AM/PM indicator
3.2 - Now tested, fully Pebble Time compliant.
3.1 - changes to appinfo.json to reflect SDK3.0-dp4 compatibility between aplite and basalt.

3.0 - Updated to SDK 3.0, added color support for Pebble Time!

Random subliminal images can now be turned OFF or ON by a tap along the Y (negative) axis. An image will show if a tap is registered.

data.description:
Remind yourself that it's time for some Slack when you look down to see the smiling face of J.R. "Bob" Dobbs! As you watch, random images will flash on the watchface at random intervals. Or maybe you're just imagining it? Random subliminal images can now be turned OFF or ON by a tap along the Y (negative) axis. An image will show if a tap is registered. 

Donate: 1JbxfRpG4iv3qscRe8wgFBXbNhmPesP723

latest_release.release_notes:
3.4 - Added support for Pebble 2 Diorite and Pebble Time 2 Emery.

data.title: DobbsHead
